description: This Dart source file defines the 'ReferralsService' class responsible for managing referral codes and rewards within the mobile application. It provides methods to submit referral codes via HTTP requests using the Dio package, handles errors, and interacts with other application components like the ApiClient and Referral model.

classes.name: ReferralsService
classes.description: Service for managing referral codes and rewards, providing functionality to submit referral codes and handle related errors.

methods.name: submitReferral
methods.description: Submits a referral code to the server and returns a Referral object upon success. Handles Dio exceptions and error messages.

methods.name: _handleError
methods.description: Handles DioException errors, extracting meaningful messages based on response data or default messages.
